sourcesContent:
<template>
    <g :transform="'matrix('+scale+','+rx+','+ry+','+scale+','+x+','+y+')'" :width="width" :height="height">
        <rect 
            :width="width" 
            :height="height" 
            :fill="backgroundColor" 
            :rx="borderRadius" 
            :ry="borderRadius" 
            @mousedown="(evt) => $emit('mousedown',evt)"
            @mousemove="(evt) => $emit('mousemove',evt)" 
            @mouseup="(evt) => $emit('mouseup',evt)" 
            @mouseleave="(evt) => $emit('mouseleave',evt)"
            class="node"
            />
        <text
          :x="x + width / 2"
          :y="y + height / 2"
          dominant-baseline="middle"
          text-anchor="middle"
          :fill="color"
          color="label"
        >
          {{ label }}
      </text>
    </g>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
        x: {
            type: Number,
            default: 0
        },
        y: {
            type: Number,
            default: 0
        },
        rx: {
            type: Number,
            default: 0
        },
        ry: {
            type: Number,
            default: 0
        },
        scale: {
            type: Number,
            default: 1
        },
        width: {
            type: Number,
            default: 100
        },
        height: {
            type: Number,
            default: 100
        },
        borderRadius: {
            type: Number,
            default: 0
        },
        backgroundColor: {
            type: String,
            default: '#aaaaaa'
        },
        color: {
            type: String,
            default: '#ffffff'
        },
        label: {
            type: String,
            default: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.node {
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow( 5px 5px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .7));
    filter: drop-shadow( 5px 5px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .7));
}

.node:hover {
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow( 7px 7px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .7));
    filter: drop-shadow( 7px 7px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .7));
    opacity: 0.7;
    stroke: orange;
    stroke-width: 2;
    
}

.label {
    pointer-events: none; 
    display: inline-block;
}
</style>
